```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(modelr)
```

```{r Problem 1.1}
birthweight = 
  read_csv("./data/birthweight.csv") %>%
  mutate(
    babysex = as.factor(babysex), 
    frace = as.factor(frace), 
    malform = as.factor(malform), 
    mrace = as.factor(mrace)
  )
  
map(birthweight, ~sum(is.na(.)))
```
